queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-staging}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-staging}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-stable}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-stable}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-design}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-design}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-reset}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-reset}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-authz}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-authz}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-transfer}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-transfer}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-staging}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-staging}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-authz}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-authz}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-design}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-design}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-reset}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-reset}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-transfer}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-transfer}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

metadata.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-stable}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-fdi-dotstatsuite-stable}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context
Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries
